 2006-12432006-10-30,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of CAROL HANSELL of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2009, in the place of J. Spencer Lanthier.
AttachmentsAttachment
